parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Inventory

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Vehicle Inventory

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets custom ammo count in the currently loaded magazine of the specified weapon. The unit must be [[local]] to the computer where command is executed.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unit '''setAmmo''' [weapon, count]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]] - Gunner or vehicle.

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [weapon, count]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> weapon: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> count: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> Set player's handgun magazine ammo count to 10 rounds:
<code>[[player]] [[setAmmo]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[handgunWeapon]] [[player]], 10];</code>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> Set player's current weapon magazine ammo count to 1 round:
<code>[[player]] [[setAmmo]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[currentWeapon]] [[player]], 1];</code>
</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> If player is a gunner in a vehicle, set current weapon magazine ammo count to 5 rounds:
<code>[[if]] ([[local]] [[vehicle]] [[player]]) [[then]] {
	[[vehicle]] [[player]] [[setAmmo]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[currentWeapon]] [[vehicle]] [[player]], 5];
} [[else]] {
	[[hint]] "Vehicle must be local to this machine for 'setAmmo' to work";
};</code>
</value></part><part><name>x4</name>=<value> If you try to set more ammo than the magazine can hold, it will be clipped at default magazine capacity:
<code>[[player]] [[setAmmo]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[primaryWeapon]] [[player]], 1000000]; //full mag with default ammo count
</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[ammo]], [[setVehicleAmmo]], [[setFuel]], [[setHit]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>New Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]</root>
